content.c_answer2: The Play That Goes Wrong is 2 hours 5 minutes (incl. interval). Performances starting at 2:30pm finish at approx. 4:35pm, performances starting at 3pm finish at approx. 5:05pm, and performances starting at 7:30pm finish at approx. 9:35pm.
content.name: How long is The Play That Goes Wrong and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is The Play That Goes Wrong and when does it finish?
